message.body: The appliance guy sent this to me this morning --- Quick question, when do you think bed bug issue going to be resolved, in speaking with one of my technicians, little apprehensive... Do you think by weekend
I wrote him back saying I have no idea. He is planning on stopping by tomorrow.
'Never' lol doesn't have good ring to it huh lol
/saying this w love , good nature etc etc
Cool. Bc I'm getting bit nightly
I just left a message for Cindy. I want her to come back in a couple days.
Never isn't an option. I know you are saying it lightheartedly (is that word?) And again Thanks for your patience with all of this.
Earlier I scrolled all the way back thru your text messages to find out when you first reported the bed bugs. August 8. It's been almost 3 months. It's insane.
Hahaha!! Anyway lets get evict these lil' Fuckers once & for all.
I hope it's a word bc I use it too
